    %% ============== 
    %% Heap ADT 
    %% ============== 
    class Heap~T~ {
        - heap: ArrayList~T~
        - comparator: Comparator~T~
        + Heap()
        + Heap(comparator: Comparator~T~)
        + insert(value: T) void
        + popMin() T
        + peek() T
        + changeValue(index: int, newValue: T) void
        + size() int
        + isEmpty() boolean
        - heapifyUp(index: int)
        - heapifyDown(index: int)
        - swap(i: int, j: int)
    }

    class Comparator~T~ {

        + compare(a: T, b: T) int

    %% ============== 
    %% Scheduler

    class EventScheduler {

        + EventScheduler()
        + scheduleEvent(timestamp: int, description: String) void
